headline.main: Trump Supporters Declare Pride in President, Slam Opponents
headline.print_headline: Trump Supporters Declare Pride in President, Slam Opponents

lead_paragraph: From Colorado's state Capitol to Trump Tower in New York and the Washington Monument, groups of hundreds of people rallied for President Donald Trump on Saturday, waving "Deplorables for Trump" signs and even carrying a life-size cutout of the president.
